Metadata.Title: CVE-2025-6442 affecting package rubygem-webrick for versions less than 1.7.0-2
Metadata.Description: CVE-2025-6442 affecting package rubygem-webrick for versions less than 1.7.0-2. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package rubygem-webrick is earlier than 1.7.0-2, affected by CVE-2025-6442
